SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.services

Class GameStateService

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.services.GameStateService
public class GameStateService extends Object
Central runtime game state holder.

Persists session-scoped data such as:

  • Star currency
  • Hero unlock flags
  • Currently selected hero
  • Per-hero appearance (body skin and — where applicable — weapon skin)
  • Current map identifier

This service is not responsible for saving to disk; it only keeps state while the game runs.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameStateService

      public GameStateService()
      Constructs the runtime game state with default values.
      • Starts with 10 stars.
      • HERO unlocked; ENGINEER and SAMURAI locked by default.
      • Default available skins registered per hero.
      • SAMURAI has separate weapon skin support.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableWeaponSkins

      public String[] getAvailableWeaponSkins(GameStateService.HeroType hero)
      Returns the available WEAPON skins for the given hero. If the hero does not define a list, returns a single-item array {"default"}.

    • getSelectedWeaponSkin

      public String getSelectedWeaponSkin(GameStateService.HeroType hero)
      Returns the currently selected WEAPON skin for the given hero. If not set, returns "default".

    • setSelectedWeaponSkin

      public void setSelectedWeaponSkin(GameStateService.HeroType hero, String skinKey)
      Sets the WEAPON skin for the given hero, validating against the allowed list if present. Notifies weapon skin listeners on success.
      Parameters:
      hero - target hero
      skinKey - weapon skin key to apply (e.g., "default", "crimson")

    • onWeaponSkinChanged

      public AutoCloseable onWeaponSkinChanged(BiConsumer<GameStateService.HeroType,String> l)
      Subscribes to WEAPON skin changes. The returned AutoCloseable removes the subscription on close/dispose.

    • setBase

      public void setBase(Entity player)
      Sets the current base (player base) entity. This is used to compute end-of-level star rewards based on remaining HP.
      Parameters:
      player - the base entity of the current map

    • getStars

      public int getStars()
      Returns the current star balance.

    • setStars

      public void setStars(int newStars)
      Overwrites the current star balance.
      Parameters:
      newStars - new star amount

    • updateStars

      public void updateStars(int increment)
      Adjusts stars by the given delta (positive or negative).
      Parameters:
      increment - amount to add (can be negative if you want to subtract)

    • spendStars

      public boolean spendStars(int amount)
      Attempts to spend the given amount of stars.
      Parameters:
      amount - stars to spend (must be non-negative)
      Returns:
      true if the spend succeeded; false if insufficient funds or invalid amount

    • rewardStarsOnWin

      public void rewardStarsOnWin()
      Rewards stars at the end of a stage based on the base's remaining health.

      Requires setBase(Entity) to have been called earlier.

    • rewardStarsByHealth

      public void rewardStarsByHealth(double healthPercent)
      Rewards stars based on remaining health percentage: 
         80–100% -> 3 stars
   50–79%  -> 2 stars
   1–49%   -> 1 star
   0%      -> 0 star
      Parameters:
      healthPercent - value in [0, 1]; out-of-range inputs are clamped

    • getHeroUnlocks

      public Map<GameStateService.HeroType,Boolean> getHeroUnlocks()
      Returns the current unlock flags for all heroes.

    • setHeroUnlocked

      public void setHeroUnlocked(GameStateService.HeroType hero)
      Marks a hero as unlocked.

    • setHeroUnlocked

      public void setHeroUnlocked(GameStateService.HeroType hero, boolean unlocked)
      Sets a hero's unlock state.
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero
      unlocked - true to unlock, false to lock

    • setSelectedHero

      public void setSelectedHero(GameStateService.HeroType type)
      Sets the currently selected hero and notifies subscribers.
      Parameters:
      type - hero to select

    • getSelectedHero

      public GameStateService.HeroType getSelectedHero()
      Returns the currently selected hero.

    • onSelectedHeroChanged

      public AutoCloseable onSelectedHeroChanged(Consumer<GameStateService.HeroType> l)
      Subscribes to selected-hero change events.

    • getAvailableSkins

      public String[] getAvailableSkins(GameStateService.HeroType hero)
      Returns the available BODY skins for the given hero. If none registered, returns {"default"}.

    • getSelectedSkin

      public String getSelectedSkin(GameStateService.HeroType hero)
      Returns the currently selected BODY skin for the given hero. Defaults to "default" if none is set.

    • setSelectedSkin

      public void setSelectedSkin(GameStateService.HeroType hero, String skinKey)
      Sets the BODY skin for the given hero, validating against the allowed list if present. Notifies skin change listeners on success.
      Parameters:
      hero - target hero
      skinKey - body skin key to apply (e.g., "default", "purple")

    • onSkinChanged

      public AutoCloseable onSkinChanged(BiConsumer<GameStateService.HeroType,String> l)
      Subscribes to BODY skin changes.

    • setCurrentMapId

      public void setCurrentMapId(String mapId)
      Sets the identifier of the current map. Example: "MapTwo" for level 2; null can represent the default map (level 1).

    • getCurrentMapId

      public String getCurrentMapId()
      Returns the current map identifier, or null for the default map.
